categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Drop Point: Condor was the codename of a Rebel Alliance drop point located in System M132L4. It was operational for the duration of Operation Nighthook, and specific communications channels were monitored from 0200 to 0600 each standard day. Alliance operatives requiring the drop point broadcast on comm channel 2588.3 using encryption code T33-A. Secondary contact was through comm channel 7349.2 using encryption code N21-H.
